Segment.name: G21
Segment.comment: To specify authorize/de-authorize code and product information

Field.name: AuthorizeDeAuthorizeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the function of the authorize/de-authorize transaction set

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: UPCEanConsumerPackageCode
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) identifying the retail shelf unit; consists of 2 high order digits identifying the system (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07, U.S. Drug = 03); the next ten digits are manufacturer ID: 5, Item ID: 5

Field.name: UPCCaseCode
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) including two high order digits identifying the "system" (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07; U.S. Drug = 03); using the U.S. Grocery system, the next ten digits are: Manufacturer (5) Case Code (5)

Field.name: Pack
Field.comment: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

Field.name: UnitPrice
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: InnerPack
Field.comment: The number of eaches per inner container

Field.name: ItemDistributionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the distribution of the item
